title: Exam: Stakeholder Management & Networking
description: Assessment of stakeholder categorization, networking terms, and relative clause precision.

items.explanation: Stakeholders with high influence (power) but low involvement (interest) should be kept satisfied.
items.prompt: According to the stakeholder matrix, which group should be 'kept satisfied'?
Ms. Gorski, ________ (who) is our primary stakeholder, will be reviewing the budget tonight.

items.explanation: An elevator pitch is a concise and persuasive summary.
items.prompt: What is the term for a short, 30-second introduction used during networking?

items.explanation: To follow up means to contact again.
items.prompt: It's essential to ________ ________ with new contacts within 48 hours of a networking event.

items.explanation: 'Whom' is used formally after a preposition like 'to'.
items.prompt: The director to ________ you were introduced is the head of Operations. (Formal)
